column4: Hi all, i keep getting the error 'E: The package index files are corrupted. No Filename: field for package gnupg.' when trying to do an 'sudo apt-get upgrade'  how do i fix this?
i keep getting the error 'E: The package index files are corrupted. No Filename: field for package gnupg.' when trying to do an 'sudo apt-get upgrade'  how do i fix this?
what version of ubuntu?  Pastebin your sources.list.  Have you ever used unofficial repositories or installed packages manually?
yeah i have... one sec and i'll paste it
and it's dapper drake, doing the upgrade before i move to edgy
ok, pastebin 'apt-cache policy gnupg' as well
sudo apt-get clean && sudo apt-get update
what are those last two repos you have for?
the apt-get clean && apt-get update worked,  but the when i tried apt-get upgrade i got the same error
try commenting *all* of the repos, 'apt-get update', then uncommenting again
thank you.... that worked... thegrade is going now
don't use this channel for that in the future please
